polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Interface DataListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTopologyManager, GenericOverlay, SimpleTopologyManager, TCPDispatchingService
public interface DataListener

Components implementing this interface may listen for the arrival of new data (i.e., any Serializable object) through some Transport.

See Also:
Transport

Method Summary
 void notifyDataArrived(java.lang.String subject, Link source, java.io.Serializable data)
          This method is called whenever a new data item arrives from a neighbor of the local node.
 

Method Detail

notifyDataArrived

void notifyDataArrived(java.lang.String subject,
                       Link source,
                       java.io.Serializable data)
This method is called whenever a new data item arrives from a neighbor of the local node.

Parameters:
subject - The subject the data was addressed to.
source - The Link the data comes from.
data - The received data item.
